name: Bob and Kuura: Lost in Snowglobe
description: Snowglobe has been ruined by the Evil Duke's corporation and it's up to you to save it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Intel® Celeron® Processor B820, 1.70GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2nd Gen Intel® HD Graphics or better Storage: 1047 MB available space
